Experiment InformationÂ¶

This component offers the main information about your experiment.

42 Experiment Information

At the top left you see the Autosubmit Searcher home link that will take you back to the Autosubmit GUI Main Page, next to it you see the Home link that serves the same purpose, then you see the About link that takes you to a page with important information about the application (including the link to this documentation). Then you see the experiment name and status, which is updated every 5 minutes.

At the bottom you see some relevant metadata, including the branch of the model that was used in the experiment, the HPC name targeted by the experiment, the owned, and the last time the experiment folder was modified, which probably coincides with the creation date of the experiment.

On the center you see the Tree Representation, which is loaded automatically when you open this page.
